lead_paragraph: The decision to deploy the carrier to contested waters was seen by some as a challenge to President-elect Donald J. Trump’s criticism of China and to American military dominance in the Pacific.

byline.contributor: Owen Guo and Yufan Huang contributed research from Beijing, and Hisako Ueno contributed research from Tokyo.

headline.print_headline: China Deploys Its Only Aircraft Carrier to Disputed South China Sea
headline.main: China Deploys Aircraft Carrier to Disputed South China Sea

snippet: The decision to deploy the carrier to contested waters was seen by some as a challenge to President-elect Donald J. Trump’s criticism of China and to American military dominance in the Pacific....
abstract: Chinese military moves its first and only aircraft carrier into disputed South China Sea; experts say move may be meant to test Pres-elect Donald Trump, who has antagonized China with recent statements and actions regarding Taiwan, North Korea, and trade.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
